title: Mr.Time : Flip-Flap
developerAddress: 2F, J Studio, 28, Donggyo-ro 25-gil, Mapo-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea, 03993
description: *This watch face is only available for Android Wear. Tizen OS(Gear S2, S3) Users can download from Galaxy apps. This watch is called 'Flip-Flap'.[Mr.Time Watchface Series]We provide various analog&digital watches with features and sub-dials.More different designs will be updated constantly.
descriptionHTML:
*This watch face is only available for Android Wear. Tizen OS(Gear S2, S3) Users can download from Galaxy apps.

This watch is called 'Flip-Flap'.

[Mr.Time Watchface Series]
We provide various analog&digital watches with features and sub-dials.
More different designs will be updated constantly.
comments: Brilliant clear watch Not only does it show Military Time (24 hour clock) it ALSO has an analogue watch face as well, for those who can not tell the time with 24 hour watches.
Just the watch i have been looking for
Only tell military time? Great face, but I don't need a watch face that only shows military time.
